price: 44. Kaadu diggah a Qhuraan koo kee ku marah massakaxxa (sharafa), kaadu sarrah esserimetton kaal abten taamak.
arabic: وَإِنَّهُۥ لَذِكۡرٞ لَّكَ وَلِقَوۡمِكَۖ وَسَوۡفَ تُسۡـَٔلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innahu ladhik'run laka waliqawmika wasawfa tus'alūna
